Text.Page:
Both {@LinkCreature:41#2008#swamp} and {@LinkCreature:41#2009#mire tentacullars} live in the two caves just north of here.

We drink their blood to grow strong, and we offer it as a gift of friendship. Kuban's going soon to visit orcan tribal leaders. It would make a wonderful peace offering.

Will you get some for {@LinkCreature:241#1013$$Kuban}?

Ah, it smells wonderful. It's all I can do not to drink it all myself.

Perhaps just a sip...
The tentacullar blood will make a fine gift for the tribes I want to bring over to the ways of peace.
